trait.name: Formation Tactics
entries: The soldier has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition grappled}, or {@condition restrained} while it is within 5 feet of at least one ally.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: The hue holdier has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.
Soldiers are found in many of Ravnica's guilds. The soldier stat block represents a typical member of the rank and file, though weaponry and armor can vary.

action.name: {@item Pistol|dmg}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: {@item Spear|phb}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Hippogriff Command
entries: The hue hippogriff rider can use your action to verbally command it to take the {@action Attack}, {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Help} action. If you don't issue a command, the beast takes the Dodge action.
The {@creature hippogriff} must be able to hear the rider.
